name: measuring_spoons
description: Precision and style blend together to enhance your cooking with this Stainless Steel Mixing Measuring Spoon Set. An essential utensil for any chef, this Measuring Spoon Set is made of gorgeous and sturdy stainless steel so it's easy to clean and adds sharp appeal to your kitchen decor. The measurements are carved into the handles to make the Spoons easy to read. Including a teaspoon, tablespoon, 1/4 teaspoon and 1/2 teaspoon, this Set ensures your recipes come out just right.
